comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I much enjoyed looking at the gallery, and learning how to do a local history study. And I had a snoop around Dalgety using Google Maps and Street View. There is an eastern elevation view of the school in Cooma Street, which has quite a slope. I wonder if they reversed the plans to fit the site? maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] You could be right; we weren't sure if the photo in the gallery was reversed or if, as you say, the plans were reversed to fit the site.

AB
